mapper.sql: EXAM_ID examId, EXAM_DATA examData, CREATE_TIME createTime
mapper.insert: insert into ph_report_data ( EXAM_ID, EXAM_DATA, CREATE_TIME ) values ( #{examId:BIGINT}, #{examData:VARCHAR}, #{createTime:TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update ph_report_data set #{EXAM_DATA = examData:VARCHAR}, #{CREATE_TIME = createTime:TIMESTAMP} where EXAM_ID = #{examId:BIGINT}
